outputs.output_descr:
Objective: To contribute to the improvement of the living conditions of the rural population of Nyagatare District

A. OUTPUT 1. Strengthened Capacities of the Authorities of Nyagatare District to plan and implement its District Development Plan: 
A.1. Support the administrative capacities of the District of Nyagatare

B. OUTPUT 2. Strengthened District capacity  in Food Security through provision of food storage facilities and training:
B.1. Build silos for foodstuffs storage and sale
B.2. Develop / rehabilitate and cultivate marshlands

C. OUTPUT 3.  Improved Productive Capacities and Management Structures of Selected Cooperatives Operating at District Level.
C.1. Increase and consolide at least 10 productive associations 
C.2. Support new service and marketing co-operatives on a competitive basis
C.3. Increase the capacity of the paddy rice husking plant
C.4. Set up a social development fund at the provincial level

D.  OUTPUT 4. Improved access to and management of potable water systems at District Level:
D.1. Provide access to drinking water
D.2. Strengthen management committees of rural infrastructure

project_descr: The project will focus on building the institutional and human resource capacities at district level to effectively plan, manage and implement their respective development plans.
